akn:content.akn:p:
§ 44106. Conduct of proceedings Part A of this subtitle applies to proceedings conducted by the Federal Maritime Commission under this chapter. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 7, Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1555.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
4410646 App.:817d(d).Pub. L. 89–777, §§ 2(d), 3(d), Nov. 6, 1966, 80 Stat. 1357, 1358; Pub. L. 104–324, title VII, § 746(c), Oct. 19, 1996, 110 Stat. 3943. 46 App.:817e(d).
The authority to prescribe regulations is omitted as unnecessary because it is already provided by section 305 of the revised title.
